content: k2 yo k2 243 sts row 10 repeat row 2 row 11 k2 yo k3 k2tog k2 yo k1 *yo k2 sl2-k1-pss2o k2 yo k1 repeat from * to last 9 sts yo k2 ssk k3 yo k2 245 sts row 12 & 13 repeat row 4 and 5 247 sts row 14 k4 *k3 p1 repeat from * to last 7 sts k7 row 15 repeat row 5 row 16 k4 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to last 4 sts k4 row 17 repeat row 1 row 18 k5 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to last 5 sts k5 row 19 repeat row 3 row 20 k6 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to last 6 sts k6 row 21 repeat row 5 bind off using a stretchy bind off as follows k2 *put tip of left needle through front of these 2 sts knit them together k1 repeat from * until you have 1 st on right needle break yarn and draw through last st finishing block weave in ends www tricksyknitter com © megan goodacre oaklet shawl page 2 www tricksyknitter com © megan goodacre oaklet shawl page 3 pattern repeat k on rs p on ws no stitch yo p on rs k on ws sl2-k1-p2sso k2tog ssk chart b p on rs k on ws k on rs p on ws yo no stitch chart a to follow charts online go to www tricksyknitter com/pages/bakery/oaklet-shawl-28 php
